description: Jump into adventure with Mario and friends! Toys inspired by the classic Nintendo universe.

toys.name: Mario Action Figure
toys.description: A detailed 6-inch Mario action figure with moveable joints.

toys.name: Mario Kart Racer
toys.description: Mini racing car featuring Mario in his iconic kart design.

toys.name: Luigi Plush Toy
toys.description: Soft and cuddly Luigi plush toy made of premium cotton.

description: Unleash your inner hero with Spider-Man action figures, masks, and gadgets.

toys.name: Spider-Man Web Shooter
toys.description: Interactive web-shooter toy with refillable foam web fluid.

toys.name: Spider-Man Action Figure
toys.description: Articulated Spider-Man figure with removable mask and web accessories.

toys.name: Spider-Man Mask
toys.description: Lightweight mask for kids to role-play their favorite superhero.

description: Magical toys inspired by Elsa, Anna, and Olaf from Disney’s Frozen.

toys.name: Elsa Singing Doll
toys.description: Elsa doll that sings 'Let It Go' with glowing blue dress.

toys.name: Olaf Plush Toy
toys.description: Adorable Olaf plush perfect for cuddling and playtime.

toys.name: Frozen Castle Playset
toys.description: Interactive castle playset featuring lights, sounds, and Elsa & Anna figurines.

description: Toys and collectibles inspired by Gotham’s legendary hero.

toys.name: Batman Action Figure
toys.description: 12-inch Batman action figure with movable cape and armor suit.

toys.name: Batmobile Car
toys.description: Die-cast Batmobile model with detailed interior and rubber tires.

toys.name: Batman Mask
toys.description: Adjustable Batman mask for costume play and imagination.

description: Fun and friendly toys from the world of Peppa Pig for preschoolers.

toys.name: Peppa Pig Family Set
toys.description: Peppa and her family figurines for storytelling and roleplay.

toys.name: Peppa’s House Playset
toys.description: Interactive house playset with furniture and Peppa Pig figures.

toys.name: George’s Dinosaur Plush
toys.description: Soft green dinosaur plush — George’s favorite toy from the show.
